price: ረዳታችሁ አላህና መልክተኛው እነዚያም ያመኑት ብቻ ናቸው፡፡ (እነርሱ) እነዚያ ሶላትን በደንቡ የሚሰግዱ እነርሱም ያጎነበሱ ኾነው ምጽዋትን የሚሰጡ ናቸው፡፡
arabic: إِنَّمَا وَلِيُّكُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُمۡ رَٰكِعُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innamā waliyyukumu al-lahu warasūluhu wa-alladhīna āmanū alladhīna yuqīmūna al-ṣalata wayu'tūna al-zakata wahum rākiʿūna
